challenges: Learning to trust themselves and others

guidelines: Trust your feelings and your inner gifts of sensitivity, strength, expressiveness, and intuition.
Develop the courage to express your feelings.
When you meet fear, don't back down.
Work in a garden; read a book about angels
questions: When it comes to my body, do I trust my instincts and intuition over outside experts or theories?
Can I express my deepest feelings? If not, why not?
How can I best use my creative energy to bring more beauty into the world?
When I don't feel trusting, how can I work this through?

advice: Maintain a balanced, moderate lifestyle that includes inner work like contemplation or meditation.
Consume a light, primarily vegetarian diet.
Engage in regular, moderate exercise like dance, t'ai chi, yoga, or swimming.
Listen to their body's needs and avoid self-destructive patterns
negative: Sensitive energy field and potential issues with the base of the spine, reproductive organs, solar plexus, heart, and knees.
Prone to self-destructive patterns like drug, food, or sex abuse when insecurity blocks creativity.
May experience physical problems as a way to learn about healing modalities
positive: Subconsciously well-versed in energetic healing arts.
Can experience enhanced well-being through a healthy lifestyle

opportunities: Creative expression (art, music, drama, writing, photography)

advice: Learn to trust their feelings and their partner.
Openly express their feelings and needs.
Engage in practices that deepen emotional connection like tantra yoga.
Avoid relying on others for a sense of completeness
negative: Fear of betrayal and getting hurt can lead to withdrawal and guardedness.
Tendency to rely on others for strength and validation.
May struggle with expressing their needs and setting boundaries
positive: Deep capacity for love and connection.
Can experience fulfilling relationships based on trust and understanding

advice: Embrace creative pursuits that inspire and uplift.
Focus on work that aligns with their values and brings beauty to the world.
Trust their abilities and pursue their passions without excessive focus on financial gain
negative: May struggle with financial instability due to prioritizing security over pursuing their passions.
Fear of failure or criticism can block creative expression.
May experience challenges finding work that feels meaningful and fulfilling
positive: Naturally drawn to careers that involve healing, creativity, and inspiring others.
Have the potential to achieve financial abundance when they trust their abilities and share their gifts with the world
